ingredients: 2 pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced,   +   3/4 cup cranberries,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg
nutrition: Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 4g 22%, Cholesterol 15mg 5%, Sodium 47mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 43g 16%, Dietary Fiber 4g 16%, Total Sugars 32g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 7mg 36%, Calcium 37mg 3%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 207mg 4%
